summary.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 可用來同步處理對 物件之存取的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是安全執行緒。 is not thread safe. 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本類別使用這個屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using this property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業屬性物件，不是直接在物件本身。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object itself. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理與其他執行緒，可能會同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might simultaneously be modifying the object.
